programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Lima, Perus airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest threat: cocaine smuggling. Handmade mats include additional handiwork: 100s of bags of cocaine. A student on vacation is carrying more than keepsakes: a hidden compartment hides cocaine. A Latvian carrier wants to cooperate. Cocaine hidden inside a wooden sculpture of Jesus Christ. Police listen in as a carrier takes a call from his contact.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: On this episode, agents of the Antinarcotics Division of Jorge Chavez International Airport, in Lima, Peru, deal with a case of unique characteristics. In the meantime, officials face language barriers as they detain an Indonesian woman. And a passenger is carrying what seem to be adorable baby blankets, but they are really full of narcotics. At the loading docks, a shipment containing 24 jars puts the drug-detecting dogs keen sense of smell to the test. Plus, the international flight rush hour results in 2 young passengers being detained side by side at the antinarcotics division headquarters.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: An early morning pursuit with the Fajardo Air and Marine unit ends in the arrest of drug traffickers with over 900 kilos of cocaine aboard their boat. Suspected smugglers are detained in a lights out vessel in the U.S Virgin Islands with a gun onboard. Air and Marine Operations and law enforcement agencies across the Caribbean pay tribute to a fallen Air and Marine agent.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Smugglers use bleach and false-bottom floors to conceal 350 kilos of cocaine, but Mayaguez Air and Marine agents uncover the stash. In the U.S. Virgin Islands, agents race around St. Thomas to intercept suspected traffickers caught on hidden trail cameras. On the west side of Puerto Rico, agents discover firearms aboard two vessels suspected of smuggling narcotics from the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: HSI agents in Miami discover a shipment of fish found to contain 37 kilos of cocaine worth almost 2 million dollars. Meanwhile, San Diego CBP officers disrupt multiple human smuggling attempts at the San Ysidro border involving 8 individuals in 3 different vehicles. And CBP agriculture specialists in Atlanta search passengers to stop the spread of destructive invasive species stemming from prohibited food items.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: San Diego CBP officers discover a battery charger concealing $14,500 of meth before stopping a vehicle bursting with meth and fentanyl worth $589,000. Meanwhile, officers at JFK uncover a collection of ancient Bactrian gold beads connected to a priceless treasure trove looted from Afghanistan. In Miami, CBP apprehends a traveler carrying $37,500 of ketamine in shampoo bottles, and HSI executes an undercover bust of the intended recipient.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: Its all hands-on-deck as crews on helicopters and speed boats risk their lives in a moonless night to pursue drug traffickers approaching the Spanish coast from the South. In other parts of the country, a different enemy threatens marine life, putting animals and plants in jeopardy. And the battle against illegal fishing continues, this time with a highly valued species of octopus.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: In Algeciras, the Diving Unit locates an illegal stockpile in the bottom of a ship. In Vizcaya, a group of young people are stuck on the side of a cliff with a dangerous tide coming in. In Huelva, the investigation of a boat yields an unexpected result.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Visit Jack Daniels Tennessee headquarters; head to Georgia to celebrate the 100th birthday of Coca-Colas iconic contour bottle; and, bite into an all-beef frank with a major Hollywood connection.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Enjoy this tasty campfire treat without ever having to rough it in the wild and ask for smore; meet the fresh, midnight-baked bun for a burger you can customize to your own perfection; and discover the chip-shaped popcorn thats become a popular snack in the skies.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Reunite with the folks making Necco Candy Wafers, which have been around since 1847; every day the English Pork Pie Company turns out thousands of steak and ale pies; and GinsengUp combines the pleasure of soda with an ancient root thats often called the king.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA, find out the story behind these three favorites: Bosco Chocolate Syrup has a blockbuster connection to Hollywood; visit a Boston facility that pumps out more than half a million Maria and Ricardos Flour Tortillas every day; warning—Mom Mades irresistible macncheese contains hidden veggies.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Its the second largest city on earth - and the most important city in Brazil. More than 10 million people live in Sao Paulo. But fitting people isnt a problem. The challenge is the citys trash. Every day, Sao Paulo generates 14,000 tons of garbage -- the weight of the leaning Tower of Pisa. Sao Paulo has embarked on a green revolution by harnessing hectares of trash to produce energy. Aluminum cans are the most recycled object on earth, and Brazil leads the way when it comes not only to recycling them, but the speed at which its done. This episode follows one aluminum can from the time it is picked by one of the catadores - the trash-pickers of Sao Paulo who make their living from collecting recyclables - through pressing, melting, and re-melting, to the moment it is ready to become a new can. State of the art technology combined with typical Brazilian ingenuity contributes not only to a clean environment, but to help poor citizens earn their living.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities revolves around worlds most iconic and most unique cities, looking at them as at a living creature that lives, breathes and develops. The series examines the infrastructure of stunning locations of our planet, which are Las Vegas, Mexico City, Hong Kong, Taipei, London, Paris, Sao Paulo, Kaohsiung, Jakarta, Mumbai and New York. Every episode uncovers the rapid growth, formal and informal economics as well as poverty, crime, and levels of social fragmentation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Maya
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin ventures into the Guatemalan jungle to explore how a new high-tech treasure map is revealing tens of thousands of ancient ruins. Now, dozens of archaeologists are heading on a voyage of discovery, exploring lost ruins for the first time in 1500 years. And what theyre finding is rewriting the history of one of the worlds most mysterious ancient civilisations - the Maya.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Maya
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin ventures into the Guatemalan jungle to explore how a new high-tech treasure map is revealing tens of thousands of ancient ruins. Now, dozens of archaeologists are heading on a voyage of discovery, exploring lost ruins for the first time in 1500 years. And what theyre finding is rewriting the history of one of the worlds most mysterious ancient civilisations - the Maya.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to Salt Lake City, Delta Airlines Flight 1141 crashes just moments after lifting off from Dallas-Fort Worth airport and erupts into flames. Of the 108 people on board, 94 make it off the plane alive while 14 die trying to escape the smoke and flames. Its clear that neither the runway nor the weather is to blame, so investigators know theres a problem with either the plane itself or its configuration.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: After circling above the Taiwan Strait to wait out a passing cyclone, TransAsia Flight 222 crashes on the Taiwanese resort island of Penghu. The media claims the storm is to blame, but the evidence soon points investigators in a different direction. Six months into the investigation, the airline is hit with a second accident. And thats when investigators uncover a systemic problem with fatal consequences.

programme.title: Buried Secrets of the Bible with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Could real events lie behind the parting of the Red Sea and the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah? To solve these mysteries, high-tech explorer Albert Lin will use satellites, drones, and space age technology to look beneath the earths surface and reveal secrets that have been buried for thousands of years. He will visit the sites of ancient cataclysms and reveal the long lost cities that lie at the heart of some of the Bibles most iconic epics.

programme.title: Chasing the Equinox
programme.desc: The ancients hid the secrets of their incredible knowledge of astronomy in their temples and palaces, built to align with the sun, on the same day, all over the world. Revealing our species obsession with the sun, across thousands of years and every continent, this is architectural magic on a cosmic scale.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Chess-playing computers are nothing new today, but how did a robot beat the worlds best chess players back in 1770? Is this the worlds first artificial intelligence, or is there sleight of hand at play? Charles Lindbergh was arguably the worlds most famous man in the 1930s, as the first to fly non-stop across the Atlantic and then have his son tragically kidnapped. Lesser known is his invention of a singular glass pump of elegant design. What is it for? A 2,400-year-old mummy is brought from Egypt to Croatia by a collector. Only after it is donated to a museum does anyone realize that this mummy is wrapped in the rarest remnant of a lost language. The writing on the wrappings is pored over by experts to decipher it. What does it say?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Towering 13 feet tall and over 11,000 years old, the Vulture Stone is a mysterious message from the end of the Ice Age, one of many relief carvings found at the site of Gobekli Tepe in Turkey. What can its strange depictions of birds, a scorpion and a headless man mean? A disturbing dome-like mask with a box where the mouth should be is the legacy of 1920s inventor and sci-fi writer Hugo Gernsback. His goal was peace and quiet on demand, but did he instead pre-empt the medical and torture applications of sensory deprivation? In a Swiss church stands a fearsome skeleton clothed in a suit of armor that is as exotic as it is impractical. Who would go to the trouble of creating such an ornately macabre work of art, and whose skeleton is it?

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Archaeologist Kathleen Martinez is leading a thrilling detective hunt on land and underwater, to unearth the final pieces of the puzzle that will unlock the story of Cleopatras last days. Armed with the latest technology and the unparalleled skills of explorer Bob Ballard, she is guaranteed to make extraordinary discoveries. This could be the find of the century: Cleopatras Lost Tomb.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did a Titan II nuclear missile explode in its Arkansas silo? What flaw made the sinking of the ferry Estonia the worst European maritime disaster since Titanic? Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: At Australias busiest airport which operates 24/7, a blackout halts operations and Resource Coordinator Andrew tries to restore power within an hour. Air Traffic Controller Melissa manages up to 700 daily plane movements. A flight must dump fuel and return to the airport after take-off due to a faulty engine warning.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Brand new series: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend join forces for a sixth series in which they rescue rusty classic vehicles from their garage prisons, returning much-loved old motors to their former glory by transforming them, inside and out. In the first episode, Tim and Fuzz are in Northern Ireland to take on one of the most challenging cars they have ever encountered: a 1959 MGA Roadster that has been rusting in a damp barn for almost 40 years. The car belongs to former engineer Billy, whose life was turned upside down several years ago when his son and daughter-in-law were drowned on their honeymoon in South Africa. The team manage to bring the car back from the brink after the shows biggest salvage operation to date, and the boys enlist the help of actor James Nesbitt as a special guest when the time comes to present Billy with his newly restored vehicle.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Oxfordshire to collect a 1973 Porsche 911 Targa. The run-down car belongs to Ben, whos had the car for around thirty-five years. But due to life getting in the way, and developing early onset dementia, he has been unable to get the car running. Wife Jeannetta and friend Andy hope that Car SOS can breathe new life into this old classic. But is the car too far gone for the boys to repair?

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz journey to a barn in Somerset where a rundown Jeep Grand Cherokee is stored. The car belongs to former soldier Ben, who after sustaining life altering injuries in the line of duty, has made it his duty to inspire and help others. But his car doesnt inspire much confidence in Tim and Fuzz as they have to turn this beaten down classic to a off roading machine! Can the boys do this, or should they have left the car back at the barn?

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Car SOS is back for a sixth series with parts blagging petrolhead Tim Shaw and master mechanic Fuzz Townshend breathing life into classic cars for unsuspecting owners. This series yet another array of iconic cars including a 1990s Lancia Delta Integrale, a 60s Citroen DS, an 80s Peugeot 205 Rally car and a 1950s MGA. Special guests this series include actor James Nesbitt and Monte Carlo legend Paddy Hopkirk.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Its called the "city of gold." From the oldest stock exchange in Asia to the largest film industry in the world?Mumbai is a city of glamour and glitz. Its Indias largest, richest and fastest city. Millions come here chasing their dreams. And to keep these people on the move, Mumbai must keep moving. More than any other city in the world, public transportation is Mumbais lifeline. Mumbais trains and buses keep this city in the fast lane?but by 2020, this city of 13 million will swell to an astounding 20 million people. Mumbai will become the most populous city in the world! Will this megacity continue to thrive? Or will it come to a screeching halt?

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: The City of Lights. The worlds capital of art, romance, and - mais oui - food. Each day, the worlds richest cuisine goes into more than two million mouths. And what goes in, must come out. A single flush begins an epic journey from the Jules Verne Restaurant at the top of the Eiffel Tower: a fantastic voyage from noxious waste to potable beverage, a voyage spanning time and technology through the fabled sewers of Paris.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: In Algeciras, the Diving Unit locates an illegal stockpile in the bottom of a ship. In Vizcaya, a group of young people are stuck on the side of a cliff with a dangerous tide coming in. In Huelva, the investigation of a boat yields an unexpected result.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: The summer season is frantic for maritime authorities. As drug boats and small dinghies sail towards Spanish territory, small vessels wait offshore to refuel them. Additionally, with the surge in tourism, the number of boats and jet skis multiplies. The Spanish Coastguards will have to confront situations that could end in tragedy.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear takes Oscar winner Natalie Portman into the slot canyons of the Escalante Desert. Along the way he teaches her technical mountaineering skills such as how to place pitons when rope climbing, how to transfer rope systems, and how to make and light a signal fire. On day 2 Natalie takes these skills that Bear has taught her and needs to execute them in order for both of them to get extracted.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear takes Marvel superhero Simu Liu into the mountains of the Canadian Rockies in the dead of winter. They are dropped on a mountain top where Bear teaches Simu how to safely descend the mountain and how to prioritize survival needs. On Day 2 Bear sets up the ultimate arctic weather challenge, testing Simu and ending in the duo stripping down and taking a plunge into a frozen lake.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Amsterdam to Cardiff, Wales, the crew of KLM Cityhopper Flight 433 report an engine problem and head back to the airport. But just as theyre about to touch down, the dual turboprop banks sharply to the right, the wing grazes the ground, and the aircraft crashes and breaks apart on a field next to the runway. Of the 24 people on board, two passengers and the captain are dead. And when investigators from the Dutch Safety Board pore over the evidence, they determine that a minor circuitry problem sparked a cascading series of fatal errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Indonesia to Hong Kong, Cathay Pacific Flight 780 is high over the South China Sea when both of the planes engines fail, turning the Airbus A-330 into a 200-ton glider. Declaring a Mayday-and determined to avoid a disastrous ocean ditching-the captain takes over manual control of the aircraft and manages to power up only one engine by very slowly increasing the throttle. But then the misfiring engine wont let him slow down for landing.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Pompeii was a thriving town on the southern coast of Italy, until it came to a sudden end in 79AD. The eruption of a nearby volcano, Mount Vesuvius, erupted, burying the city in millions of tonnes of ash and debris. Now excavators are digging to unearth the dark side of this idyllic Roman town by uncovering an enslaved persons room.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Gladiators capture the imagination like no other aspect of Ancient Rome. But who were they and what was the secret of their appeal? We follow a new season of excavations to find answers. Teams scale the façade of Romes famous Colosseum, decipher warrior tombstones and unearth an extraordinary lost amphitheatre in Turkey, transforming the popular image of savage and bloodthirsty gladiator combat.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. A womans bag is flagged in the x-ray area but shes already been inspected twice. Police must decide whether to tear the bag apart or let her go. An Italian man claims not to understand the police. He may be telling the truth. Or he may be trying to evade the law. A shipment of childrens toys may hide a stash of cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police rush to handle a rare incident on a domestic flight: something suspicious in a Serbian citizens bag. Agents find liquid cocaine disguised in drink bottles in another mans bag. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates a deadly new fentanyl cocktail called "tranq dope" thats devastating American users. Shes spent her career covering the deadly waves of the countrys opioid crisis, but shes never seen it this bad. Seeking answers, she heads to Sinaloa, the heart of Mexicos cartel land, to get answers, and makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana hears rumors that young women from Vietnam are being kidnapped and trafficked into China to be sold as unwilling brides. This begins a journey unlike any shes been on, as shes forced to navigate government minders, geopolitical tensions and shadowy criminal networks in a search for the truth. What she finds, with the help of a local reporter, is more shocking than she even imagined.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: By day, maritime authorities conduct high-stakes operations, disrupting the drug trades resources. As the night falls, relentless chases unfold against traffickers and smugglers. Humanitarian crises intensify under the cover of darkness. Yet, the discovery of an explosive in the port is anything but routine, adding a suspenseful twist to the unfolding drama on the high seas.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: Will you dare to embark with the Huelva Maritime Service to catch dangerous traffickers? Will you join those who set sail for a night shift in Almería to prevent the human trafficking trade? Will you dive into the waters of Girona to defuse undetonated weaponry? Join us on a thrilling journey as we delve into the heart of these daring missions together with the Spanish coastguards.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. A womans bag is flagged in the x-ray area but shes already been inspected twice. Police must decide whether to tear the bag apart or let her go. An Italian man claims not to understand the police. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Sir Francis Drake, a hero to the English, known as The Dragon to the Spanish. From his journeys as a slave trader to his vicious attacks on Spanish colonial towns, Drakes status continues to rise with the endless stolen plunder he brings to Queen Elizabeth 1st. The circumnavigation is the pinnacle of his career, cementing him in history as the worlds most controversial pirate.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Grace OMalley, the Pirate Queen of Ireland. Born to a seafaring family, OMalley defied gender conventions to become the most feared and respected leader of both the land and the sea. Using marriage to wrangle her political position and securing lands through a meeting with Queen Elizabeth, OMalleys rise from wanted pirate to Chieftain is won through a warriors sword and a womans grit.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: The Englishman turned Algerian pirate. From humble beginnings as an impoverished sailor, John Ward grows tired of the drudgery of the English navy. At the age of 50 he starts his remarkable ascent from petty pirate to a notorious menace in the Mediterranean sea, converting to Islam and becoming a protected ruler of the Tunisian empire.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear takes Oscar winner Natalie Portman into the slot canyons of the Escalante Desert. Along the way he teaches her technical mountaineering skills such as how to place pitons when rope climbing, how to transfer rope systems, and how to make and light a signal fire. programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Indonesia to Hong Kong, Cathay Pacific Flight 780 is high over the South China Sea when both of the planes engines fail, turning the Airbus A-330 into a 200-ton glider. Declaring a Mayday-and determined to avoid a disastrous ocean ditching-the captain takes over manual control of the aircraft and manages to power up only one engine by very slowly increasing the throttle. But then the misfiring engine wont let him slow down for landing.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees, Ryan reveals the steps to finding "the one," underdog style. From first attraction in giant-nosed proboscis monkeys to the importance of wingmen in turkey courtship or even foreplay with flying foxes, these animals are rewriting the rule book on messy and complicated relationships in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles "The Superzeros," a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetahs speed and the eagles eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: Wild Transylvania: Draculas Hidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Draculas Transylvania lair is brimming with amazing wildlife. Shielded by the Carpathian Mountains, its a pristine wonderland that remains unchanged since the Middle Ages. Home to 26 species of bats, his kingdom is truly a night flyers paradise. Chamois, cuckoos, Ural owls, wild boar, lynx, brown bears, and huge wolf packs also thrive in a natural world beyond Bram Stokers imagination.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols rush to prepare for their farms first Michigan winter. The family goes into hyperdrive to fix the pasture fence and finish building the garden hardscape before the first snow falls. Beth is worried about the bees, so she brings in some expert help to hopefully ensure their survival.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: She haunts the trees and hills in the heart of the realm. She is solitary, silent and virtually invisible. Saba the leopard is a killer without rival. Saba is the most spectacular and resourceful hunter the Savage Kingdom has seen. Her stronghold, Leopard Rock, sits at the heart of this brutal realm it is a place where she can vanish into the shadows and avoid running into her rivals lions, hyenas and wild dogs. There is no question that Saba the leopard can take care of herself, but her strength and resilience will be cruelly tested when she tries to bring two cubs into the realm where only she can protect and feed them in the midst of the cauldron of warring predators. The ordeal will tear at her heart.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Savute is a land where natural law is taken to its limit and sometimes... beyond. Across six episodes we see the full impact that the cycle of Savutes seasons has on every carnivore clan. The rains leave a time of birth and plenty in their wake, but all too soon the soil is parched and the grass gone. Rival tribes of predators are squeezed into a cauldron of competition. This season in Savute, who will survive?

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Coastal Queens. In the Gulf of California, the orca familys success relies on the experience of their 63-year-old matriarch while on the beaches of Alaska, a first-time bear mother must raise her three cubs alone, with only her instincts to guide her.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through her early vulnerable months. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother, the matriarch, that must protect her. Facing predators, drought and a rapidly changing world can this new baby and her family of iconic females survive?

programme.title: Savage Kingdom

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Brand new series. Savute, Botswana: 2000 square miles of remote African savannah. This ancient land is governed by competing clans of ruthlessly proficient predators - leopards, lions, hyenas and wild dogs. Their survival depends on the giant herds of powerful prey - buffalo, elephant and zebra - who have roamed Savute in search of sustenance, season after season, millennium after millennium. Each day is a life-or-death struggle - animal against animal, animal against nature. There is no mercy, and there is but one rule: survive. In this episode, a small family of wild dogs goes on the run, desperately looking for a safe place to raise six tiny puppies. But the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. Narrated by Charles Dance.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Savute, Botswana: 2000 square miles of remote African savannah. This ancient land is governed by competing clans of ruthlessly proficient predators - leopards, lions, hyenas and wild dogs. Their survival depends on the giant herds of powerful prey - buffalo, elephant and zebra - who have roamed Savute in search of sustenance, season after season, millennium after millennium. Each day is a life-or-death struggle - animal against animal, animal against nature. There is no mercy, and there is but one rule: survive. Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal. While the marsh pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the northern pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests and hills. Once a great pride, their sons have been banished, and if they cant rebuild their pride they face hunger, exile or worse. Narrated by Charles Dance.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Brand new series: Savute, Botswana: 2000 square miles of remote African savannah. Their survival depends on the giant herds of powerful prey - buffalo, elephant and zebra - who have roamed Savute in search of sustenance, season after season, millennium after millennium. Each day is a life or death struggle - animal against animal, animal against nature. The old lion Queen is dead and now Matsumi, the greatest hunter, takes the throne. Leading the most brutal army in the realm, she faces many challenges in holding this volatile gang together and appeasing her King. Narrated by Charles Dance.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, a group of penguins left the ice in search of more. Riding powerful currents, the tiny adventurers arrived in strange new lands, reshaping traditions for deserts, tropics … and even among humans. They were tested to the extreme, becoming perhaps the smartest of them all. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory discovers penguin problem solving, talking, and their enduring search for new worlds.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isnt enough. Shes constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gabriels rīko Talantu šovu, taču Ātrummeistars izdomā plānu, lai viņš būtu vienīgais dalībnieks. Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ar steigu jāuzbūvē liels dambis, kas pilsētu pasargās no plūdiem Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs grib kļūt par līderi un izveidot dabas klubu, lai atstātu iespaidu uz Potsa kundzi. Vai viņa fakti ir pareizi? Padingtons nokrīt un zaudē savu rāpšanās pašapziņu. Bez rāpšanās viņš nejūtas kā savā ādā - ko viņš var darīt?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz mammai uzkopt pēc brokastīm. Mamma stāsta, ka pudeles jāliek zaļā tvertnē, lai tās pārstrādātu. Vecās avīzes liek sarkanajā kastē, bet bundžas - zilajā. Pepa un Džordžs ar prieku piepilda tvertnes.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pazudusi Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Draudzības diena! Kad Ātrmeistara dāvana Makrupuča kungam noiet greizi, viņam jālūdz Rabla komandas palīdzība. Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Draudzības diena! Kad Ātrmeistara dāvana Makrupuča kungam noiet greizi, viņam jālūdz Rabla komandas palīdzība. Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš, Giljermo un Isabela rotaļājas ārā, taču sākas lietus. Dora dvīņiem pastāsta, ka tādā laikā var laimēties ieraudzīt varavīksni. Varavīksne tiešām parādās, tomēr tai trūkst vairāku krāsu: zilās, sarkanās un dzeltenās! Dora dodas uz Isas dārzu, lai aizņemtos krāsas no košajām puķēm. Uzveikusi Garnadzi, Dora aiznes krāsas Varavīksnei, kura iepriecina dvīņus ar savu košo spožumu. // Zābaciņš ļoti lepojas ar savu krāsaino gumiju bumbu un vēlas to izmēģināt beisbola spēlē. Taču bumba aizlido tālu projām! Karte pastāsta, ka tā nonākusi Kaimiņu mežā, kur dzīvo Simtkāje Sintija. Zābaciņam ir bail uzrunāt daudzkājaino kaimiņieni, tomēr Dora viņu iedrošina. Galu galā Sintija labprāt atdod bumbu... un pat iesaistās draugu spēlē!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.desc: Kad Motorei vajag palīdzību ugunsdzēsēju depo, pilsētā ierodas jauns ugunsdzēsēju kapteinis, lai apmācītu visus ķepaiņus. Čārdžers grib palīdzēt Sjerrai Spīdošajai ar viņas jauno šovu, bet viņa savainotā ķepa izraisa konusveidīgus sarežģījumus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: Ķepu patruļa ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā,

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf has always dreamed of observing a very special star that is only visible once every three thousand years. Unfortunately, Monkey breaks his telescope while playing with Baby Smurf, in a way that even Handy cant fix. Feeling very guilty, he goes off into the forest looking for a star for Papa Smurf. Baby Smurf is very upset about being separated from his good friend Monkey. So Papa Smurf promises to go looking for him the next day but the problem is no one knows where hes gone. // During a test run in the forest, Handy loses his jetpack. Its found and picked up by Dwayne who wants to make himself one in his size. Determined to get it back from Gargamel, Handy wants to put together a dream team with Hefty, Smurfette and Storm. But hell have to make do with Blossom, Bubble and Baby Smurf who are the only ones available to help him. So he sets off on his own to accomplish his mission and face Dwayne in the air.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: In order to help Scaredy to overcome his fear of pretty much everything, Blossom, Hefty and Smurfette organize a trip into the forest for him. But as theyre exploring, their car breaks down. While Hefty is trying to fix the car, Blossom suggests the others explore a cave but they disturb a mother spider who is not happy to see them! Time to run! Scaredy overcomes all of his fears to save his friends and proves just how brave he actually is. // Baby Smurf is having fun with Painters paint on one of his canvases and everyone in the village thinks the paintings are amazing. Not wanting to admit that the paintings arent his, Painter has to find a way of reproducing Baby Smurfs style, but its proving very hard to do. So he lets Baby Smurf express himself freely, whilst still pretending that the paintings were his. Hes put on the spot when he has to create a fresco in front of the whole village ... and then he finally has to admit that Baby Smurf is actually the artist.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Meteorite and her band are playing a concert to motivate the Smurfs who are picking blueberries, but their concert attracts Gargamel. This time, to outwit him, the Smurfs have a plan: they dance until hes exhausted and then run away from him. This tactic gives Gargamel an idea: to clone himself. He manages to create a Gargamel-karateka and a child-Gargamel, but they dont turn out to be as useful as hed hoped... They do capture Brainy Smurf but he doesnt let them get away with it. // Papa Smurf is constantly interrupted by the Smurfs asking for advice about all sorts of things, so he loses his patience and tells them hes not the Tree of Knowledge. The Smurfs believe the legend and go looking for the tree in the forest. Dimwitty goes off in a sulk because everyone always makes fun of his ideas, and he unexpectedly falls into a hollow tree trunk. When the Smurfs walk past it, they think theyve found the legendary tree so listen carefully to its advice.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When worms move in to SpongeBobs holes, its up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else. 14:30 Kamp Koral Join SpongeBob and his pals as they spend the summer building underwater campfires, catching wild jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck at the craziest camp in the kelp forest, Kamp Koral!
